site.title: Skilled Trade Manpower
site.description: Workforce growth partner combining Employment Recruiting, Social Media Marketing for Hiring, Sales Team Staffing, and Skilled Labor Staffing.

hero.title: Recruiting, Social Media Hiring, Sales Teams, and Skilled Trade Staffing
hero.subtitle: We are a workforce growth partner. We combine recruiting, digital marketing, and workforce delivery to provide better people, faster.

servicesOverview.title: Comprehensive Workforce Solutions
servicesOverview.subtitle: Four pillars to solve your staffing challenges.

processPreview.title: How We Work
processPreview.subtitle: A streamlined process to get you the talent you need.

recruiting.title: Employment Recruiting
recruiting.desc: Full-cycle recruiting to find the best permanent talent for your organization.
recruiting.problem: Finding qualified candidates takes time and resources you don't have.
recruiting.solution: We handle sourcing, screening, and interviewing to present you with top-tier candidates.

socialHiring.title: Social Media Marketing for Hiring
socialHiring.desc: Targeted digital campaigns to attract active and passive candidates.
socialHiring.problem: Traditional job boards are often not enough to reach the best talent.
socialHiring.solution: We use social platforms and digital outreach to build a pipeline of qualified candidates.

salesTeams.title: Sales Team Staffing
salesTeams.desc: Recruiting and staffing high-performing sales professionals to drive revenue.
salesTeams.problem: Scaling a sales team requires finding individuals with the right drive and skills.
salesTeams.solution: We vet and place SDRs, BDRs, Account Executives, and Inside Sales reps.

skilledLabor.title: Skilled Labor Staffing
skilledLabor.desc: On-demand skilled workforce for Healthcare, Construction, Technology, and General Labor.
skilledLabor.problem: Project deadlines require reliable, skilled hands on deck immediately.
skilledLabor.solution: We deploy vetted, ready-to-work teams to your site.

projectManagement.title: Project Management & Supervision
projectManagement.desc: We provide on-site supervisors to manage the workflow, attendance, and performance of the deployed workforce.
projectManagement.problem: Managing a temporary workforce takes focus away from your core operations.
projectManagement.solution: Our experienced supervisors handle daily logistics and performance management.

safetyCompliance.title: Safety & Compliance Training
safetyCompliance.desc: Ensuring every worker is job-ready and compliant with industry standards.
safetyCompliance.problem: Unqualified or unsafe workers create liability and project delays.
safetyCompliance.solution: We handle certifications, safety briefings, and compliance checks before deployment.

common.valuePropDesc: We don't just wait for applications. We actively recruit and use social media marketing to build a massive pipeline of qualified candidates for this specific industry. This ensures you get people who are ready to work now.
common.screeningDesc: Every candidate undergoes a screening process tailored to the industry. While we cannot legally guarantee every individual's future actions, our rigorous vetting significantly reduces turnover and risk.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Staffing
healthcare.desc: Reliable medical and support staff for hospitals, clinics, and care facilities.

construction.title: Construction Staffing
construction.desc: Skilled tradespeople for commercial and residential projects.

technology.title: Technology Staffing
technology.desc: Tech talent for IT support, installation, and infrastructure.

generalLabor.title: General Labor
generalLabor.desc: Hardworking teams for warehousing, logistics, and site support.

employers.title: Partner with Skilled Trade Manpower
employers.subtitle: Your engine for recruiting, hiring marketing, and workforce delivery.
employers.whyUs: We don't just post jobs. We market them. We don't just send resumes. We vet candidates. We provide a complete workforce solution.

items.title: Reduced Hiring Time
items.desc: We fill positions 3x faster than traditional internal recruiting methods.

items.title: Lower Turnover
items.desc: Our rigorous vetting process ensures better fit and longer retention.

items.title: Cost Efficiency
items.desc: Save on advertising, screening, and onboarding costs. Pay only for performance.

items.title: Scalability
items.desc: Scale your workforce up or down instantly based on project demands.

step1.title: Consultation
step1.desc: We understand your specific needs and culture.

step2.title: Sourcing & Strategy
step2.desc: We launch recruiting or marketing campaigns.

step3.title: Screening & Vetting
step3.desc: Rigorous checks to ensure quality (where applicable).

step4.title: Deployment / Hired
step4.desc: The right people start working for you.

items.q: How fast can you provide staff?
items.a: For general labor, often within 24-48 hours. Specialized roles may take 3-5 days.
Yes, we cover workers' compensation and liability insurance for all our staff.
We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If a worker isn't a fit in the first few hours, we replace them.

qualityStandard.title: The Quality Standard
qualityStandard.subtitle: We don't cut corners. Our rigorous process ensures you get reliable, compliant, and skilled professionals.

cards.title: Vetting & Compliance
cards.desc: Every candidate undergoes background checks, drug screening (where applicable), and certification verification.

cards.title: On-Site Supervision
cards.desc: For large deployments, we provide on-site managers to handle attendance, performance, and safety.

cards.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
cards.desc: If a worker doesn't meet your standards within the first 4 hours, we replace them at no cost to you.
